stimulusHtml: Dr. Whitlock is conducting an experimental study on the effectiveness of antipsychotic medication. Which of the following will most likely be her dependent variable?
choicesHtml: Type of medication, because this is the variable she is manipulating.
Frequency of auditory hallucinations, because this is the variable she is measuring.
Self-reported depression, because this is the variable she is manipulating.
Serotonin levels, because this is the variable she is measuring.
